creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
The phrase "Lazy Majority" is used but not defined in the guidelines page [1] in the paragraph Action items / Release plan

Is it a misprint for "Lazy Consensus" ?

Or does it mean something else, if so what?


[1] http://httpd.apache.org/dev/guidelines.html

This has been clarified in r1542294.

Now, in [1], it is defined as:
  (at least 3 x +1 and more +1 than -1)
creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr
